comment.text: This translation key is used to display the desktop editor download URL for the MobileLinux organization. It appears on a button component, inviting users to download the desktop editors for Linux.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Redaktorları' is a less common and potentially less accurate translation of 'Editors'. A more common and accurate translation would be 'Redaktoru'

The term 'applications de bureau' is a more literal translation of 'Desktop Editors'. While not wrong, it's not as natural. A more accurate and idiomatic translation would be something like 'éditeurs de bureau' or 'logiciels de bureau'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Télécharger les éditeurs de bureau {{organizationName}} pour Linux

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Desktop Editors' isn't directly translated. It's better to convey the meaning rather than just transliterating. A more accurate translation might be 'Լրագրավարման ծրագրեր' (Programming tools) or 'Բջջային ծրագրերի խմբագրիչներ' (Mobile application editors).  The specific translation depends on the intended meaning of 'Desktop Editors' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Desktop Editors' based on its meaning. Possible suggestions: 'Լրագրավարման ծրագրեր' or 'Բջջային ծրագրերի խմբագրիչներ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a hyphen '-' instead of a space after 'Editors'. This looks unnatural in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the hyphen '-' with a space after 'Editors'. Example: 'Editors-ը' becomes 'Editors-ը'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "බාගන්න" (bagan-na) translates to "get" or "bring" but in this context, "download" is more accurate. It doesn't convey the action of downloading a software.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Linux සඳහා {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors බාගා ගන්න (Linux saha {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors baga gatanna) or Linux සඳහා {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors උදෙසා බාගා ගන්න (Linux saha {{organizationName}} Desktop Editors udasa baga gatanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Уређиваче" (Uređivače) translates to 'Editors' but sounds a bit formal or technical for a user-facing download instruction. A more natural phrasing might be 'Програме за уређивање' (Programa za uređivanje) or simply 'Апликације' (Aplikacije).
